50-year-old.context: This is a 50-year-old female who has had a history of chronic left facial pain.

chronic left facial pain.context: This is a 50-year-old female who has had a history of chronic left facial pain.

history of sinus surgery.context: She has had a history of sinus surgery in the past on the left side.

chronic sinusitis.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: 1. Chronic sinusitis.   2. Sinus cephalgia.

sinus cephalgia.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: 1. Chronic sinusitis.   2. Sinus cephalgia.

chronic inflammation.context: On CT evaluation of the sinuses, she revealed to have chronic inflammation within the left maxillary sinus as well as a hypoplastic maxillary sinus.

hypoplastic maxillary sinus.context: On CT evaluation of the sinuses, she revealed to have chronic inflammation within the left maxillary sinus as well as a hypoplastic maxillary sinus.

Functional endoscopic sinus surgery.context: Functional endoscopic sinus surgery with left anterior ethmoidectomy and left mastoid antrostomy for chronic sinusitis and sinus cephalgia

left anterior ethmoidectomy.context: Functional endoscopic sinus surgery with left anterior ethmoidectomy and left mastoid antrostomy for chronic sinusitis and sinus cephalgia

left mastoid antrostomy.context: Functional endoscopic sinus surgery with left anterior ethmoidectomy and left mastoid antrostomy for chronic sinusitis and sinus cephalgia

General endotracheal tube.context: Anesthesia: General endotracheal tube converted from IV sedation.

IV sedation.context: Anesthesia: General endotracheal tube converted from IV sedation.

10% cocaine solution.context: cotton pledgets saturated with 4 cc of 10% cocaine solution were inserted into the nasal cavities.

1% lidocaine with 1:100000 epinephrine s.context: The nasal septum and the turbinates were then localized with a mixture of 1% lidocaine with 1:100000 epinephrine solution.

Merocel packing.context: A Merocel packing was placed in the left nasal cavity for hemostatic purposes with the intent to remove in the recovery.
